data.title: Great location great weekly specials
data.text: This place has a diffrent special each week night. Even a $6 steak on Thursdays. You must buy 2 beverages but it dosnt have to be alcohol. Fun place to hang out with friends

data.title: Great Venue, Bad service
data.text: 2nd Ave Saloon is one of the main bars in the downtown area with a huge venue.  Most popularity for this location is after 9:00 on the weekends for dancing and club atmosphere or to watch a UFC fight.  If you are going at any other time the service is really bad.  Pool tables all in pretty rough shape too.

data.title: Don't go here
data.text: One of the worst places to eat in Upland. The food is way overpriced. The staff is rude. They gave my friend the wrong beer and lied about it. The service was the worst. We waited 45 min. for food. The staff kept asking is everything alright as if they knew it wasn't.

data.title: Don't bother
data.text:
Since it is so close to home we've tried this place many times and each time we've gone we leave saying we'd never come back again. I guess their only plus is the pool tables. Otherwise we'd never set foot in the joint.
Waitress' are jerks, they even talk back to you for any reason, the bar service is slow and if you are not a friend your drinks are weak.

data.title: Good bar in downtown upland
data.text: Came here during Halloween once and it was a blast with friends, good place to get drinks , as far as food didn't try anything and parking is outside .
